item.title: SMILES ‚Äì The Summer School of Machine Learning at Skoltech
item.description: Participated in the international summer school SMILES ‚Äì The Summer School of Machine Learning at Skoltech from 16 to 21 August 2020. In the poster session, I talked about two “AI & Satellite Problems” projects that we were engaged in at the Laboratory of Methods for Big Data Analysis at the National Research University Higher School of Economics. Below is the submitted poster and the certificate provide. Poster PDF Certificate PDF Post about Data Analysis for Satellite Tracking

Bio Hi, I’m a PhD student and Research Assistant at the Faculty of Computer Science üñ•Ô∏è in the Higher School of Economics (Moscow, Russia üá∑üá∫). Among my scientific interests are such areas as Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, Deep Learning, Reinforcement Learning and Computer Vision. If you have questions or just want to get in touch, then feel free to contact me an email at ligremyachikh@edu.hse.ru. My research IDs: Google Scholar
